nodes.text: The Carlac Death Watch camp was a base maintained by the Mandalorian splinter group Death Watch on the planet Carlac during the Clone Wars. Around 21 BBY, Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano and Lux Bonteri were brought to the camp by Death Watch lieutenant Bo-Katan Kryze after they landed on Carlac.
The Death Watch's camp on Carlac first appeared in Star Wars canon in the fourteenth episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fourth season, entitled "A Friend in Need."
